100.name: Imbue In Poison
100.description: Imbues your weapon with poison, dealing damage to your enemies

101.name: Fearless Strikes
101.description: Land a series of blows against your enemy.

102.name: Behind You!
102.description: Teleports to the enemy's back, hitting them in a cowardly way

103.name: Unfair Blow
103.description: Nothing worse than an attack on the lower parts... So attack them

104.name: Frenzy
104.description: Go into a frenzy, attacking multiple times

204.name: Ether Manipulation
204.description: Ether manipulation, its origins come from the prisoner Ricardo Eletro, better known as, Ricardo Ereto.
